chapters.title: Chapter 1:  Fanning the Sparks
chapters.info: Admer Nem, p. 40 (32)—Man whose barn Min, Siuan, Leane, and Logain slept in on their journey through the countryside. He found them, and in the chaos his lantern fell into the hay and the barn burned to the ground. Nem would just as soon have hanged them, had the local lord, Gareth Bryne, not shown up at that moment. See also Nem, Maigan.
